summary: This is a Overhaul of Aspen Hills which is a remake of Lunds Hut, The Interior is more Magical & Fun The exterior is more Practical, Its A Beautiful Player and / or Companion home...
descriptionHtml:
NEW**This is a Remake of my old version Aspen Hills, Much has changed, Totally new interior and exterior, There is a forge, Armor Workbench and Sharping wheel, Smithing Supplies, 2 Goats and some Chickens! Sure beats the Skeevers! 
NEW Pictures are uploaded..





This is a Overhaul of Lunds Hut, He didn\'t need it anymore so, I got rid of the Skeevers, The Trash and of course Lund...Its A Player home/ Companion home...Lots of Blacksmith Crafting Items...A stable was added and a player horse..Outdoor lighting, more trees and flowers...Oh yeah, and Bandif a friend who bunks with the horse, He keeps away the critters and bandits!
This is my first mod so everything isn\'t perfect...Please forgive any typos English is my native language!:) I will be adding on so look for updates! Hope you like!
To install: after unziping, Just drop file into \"data\" folder in your skyrim directory....
Known conflicts: Cloaks of Skyrim
author: ICESPIDERS
